action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: A man is holding a blue travel mug in his right hand and a sandwich in his left hand. He is wearing a grey and white striped sweater. He is looking at the camera and smiling. The background is blurry and appears to be outdoors.

You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: Two giraffes are walking on a dirt path. The taller giraffe is in the foreground and the shorter giraffe is behind it. The giraffes are walking towards the right side of the image. There is a fence in the foreground and a large tree trunk on the right side of the image. There is a grassy hill in the background.

This is my DESCRIPTION: A man is holding a blue travel mug in his right hand and a sandwich in his left hand. He is wearing a grey and white striped sweater. He is looking at the camera and smiling. The background is blurry and appears to be outdoors.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my image that may be different to your image. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Is there any foliage or greenery in the background of your image?

This is my DESCRIPTION: Two giraffes are walking on a dirt path. The taller giraffe is in the foreground and the shorter giraffe is behind it. The giraffes are walking towards the right side of the image. There is a fence in the foreground and a large tree trunk on the right side of the image. There is a grassy hill in the background.
QUESTION: Is there any foliage or greenery in the background of your image? Start your answer with "ANSWER:" and do not add anything else.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my image that may be different to your image. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Are there any other animals in your image besides the giraffes?

ANSWER: Yes.
QUESTION: Are there any other animals in your image besides the giraffes? Start your answer with "ANSWER:" and do not add anything else.

Now come to a decision. What do you think: are your picture and the other picture described the same picture?  Write "DECISION: same image" if you think they are the same picture or "DECISION: different images" if you think they are different pictures. Do not add anything else.
